1258970.name: LunarLux Chapter 1
1258970.description:
This is the RPGMaker Version of LunarLux Chapter 1!

As of 2022, LunarLux has switched engines and has been rebuilt from the ground-up on GameMaker Studio 2!
LunarLux the full game will include 5 Total Chapters and will be hosted on a NEW STORE PAGE on Steam Titled: 'LunarLux'

If you enjoyed the RPGMaker Version of LunarLux, you'll absolutely love the GMS2 version and its improvements!
Be sure to Wishlist the full game on the NEW STORE PAGE HERE:!

Thank you for your support!

-CosmicNobab Games
1258970.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
